data: Seeing himself served in this way, Don Quixote said to his squire, "I have always heard it said, Sancho, that to do good to boors is to throw water into the sea.
The History of Don Quixote, Volume 1, Part 08
Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616; Dor√©, Gustave, 1832-1883 [Illustrator]; Ormsby, John, 1829-1895 [Translator]
